Uses of Package
com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper

  • Packages that use com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper
    Helper classes which allow the developer to easily make calls between the 'conversation' services, (Conversation, Speech to Text and Text to Speech).
  • Classes in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper used by com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper 
    Class and Description
    CompletionHandler
    For receiving a response once a request for an action performed in ConversationHelper has completed.
    ConversationHelper
    Converse with the Conversation Service through text and voice.
    ConversationHelper.Builder
    Configures and creates a new ConversationHelper object.
    TranscribeDelegate
    Receives SpeechResults from ConversationHelper.sendVoiceContinuous(InputStream, TranscribeDelegate) (interim results included).
